author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Och-Ziff Capital Management Group ‍As Of April 1, Estimated Unaudited Amount Of AUM About $32.3 Billion
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - Och-Ziff Capital Management Group LLC :
* ‍AS OF APRIL 1, ESTIMATED UNAUDITED AMOUNT OF AUM ABOUT $32.3 BILLION, DECREASE OF ABOUT $1.0 BILLION SINCE MARCH 1, 2018​ Source text ( bit.ly/2H7oF0W ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
